name: Zeus
short: King of the Greek gods — lord of the sky, thunder and law.

name: Athena
short: Goddess of wisdom, craft and strategic war.

name: Ra
short: Solar deity of creation and kingship, guardian of the sun.

name: Isis
short: Goddess of magic, motherhood and healing.

name: Odin
short: Allfather — seeker of wisdom and battle-scarred ruler.

name: Thor
short: God of thunder, protector of Midgard, mighty in storms.

name: Jupiter
short: Roman counterpart to Zeus, ruler of gods and thunder.

name: Venus
short: Goddess of love, beauty and desire in Roman mythos.
